entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow level rising to 900 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
